description: The Samsung UN22D5003 LED TV lets you see for yourself how Clear Motion Rate 120 delivers fast moving images with outstanding clarity on a 22-inch HDTV. Samsung's ConnectShare JPEG technology lets you plug in a thumb drive or other USB device and play media files using your remote to control it all. When it's time for movie titles and TV programming, the UN22D5003 delivers a clear and captivating picture in full 1080p HD resolution. Simply connect your digital devices and enjoy. Watch your favorite movies-and memories-with incredible LED picture quality on a 26-inch HDTV. Makes Sharing Memories as Easy as Watching Movies. "Product Size (W x H x D) Without Stand 20.3 x 12.4 x 1.6 Inches . Product Size (W x H x D) With Stand  20.3 x 13.8 x 4.9 Inches.Input/Output:2 x HDMI (19 pin HDMI Type A),1 x Composite video / component video input (RCA phono x 3),1 x USB (4 pin USB Type A),1 x Audio line-in (RCA phono x 2) What's in the Box Samsung UN22D5003 22" Class LED HDTV     Remote Control     1-Year Parts & 1-Year Labor Warranty (90 Days Parts & Labor For Commercial Use) Ideal for wall mounting. VESA 75mm x 75mm compliant.
title: Samsung UN22D5003 22-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black) [2011 MODEL]
